subject: Re: [junit] JFCUnits.... My swing code
msgSnippet: I assume that you are asking about unit testing JFC code?  I don t have a lot of experience with JFC.  Do you have experience unit testing other code?  What
messageBody:
I assume that you are asking about unit testing JFC code? I don't have
a lot of experience with JFC. Do you have experience unit testing other
code? What about JFC makes it hard? Thanks,

David Saff

vpidaparthi wrote:

> I am completely a novice to JFCUnits. Here is my question.
> Is it possible to write JFCUnits without intruding into the actual
> code we are testing? How?
>
>
>
>
